name: Jupe On A Goop
description:
Jupe On A Goop is a small Arcade 2D Platformer in the vein of Mario Bros. and Handsome Mr. Frog. Game sessions tend to be relatively small, giving you plenty of time to hop back in again and try to get a higher score! You play as Jupe, whose only ambition is to jump on some goops.

Controls: 

  • Arrow Keys, WASD, XInput Gamepad analog or dpad for left, right, up, and down
  • Up, W, "X/Square" or "A/X" buttons to Jump

Any bugs, suggestions, or feedback? Please let me know!
